1.0.0.name: wordpress/sequentitle
1.0.0.description:
Automatically creates a sequentially numbered post title of your choosing if the title is left blank when the post is published. The plugin keeps track of what number to use and increments the number every time you publish a post with a blank title. Additionally, the post slug/url will be updated to reflect the new title if the author did not specify one manually.

An options page is available to set the title you want to use or to tweak the incremental number, should it become necessary. This plugin is very basic and is not multi-user aware. If any author on the site publishes a post with a blank title, SequenTitle will do it's song and dance.
